Features.title: Smart Recommendations
Features.text: Get personalized game suggestions based on your preferences and play history.

Features.title: Community Ratings
Features.text: See ratings and reviews from real players to help you choose your next game.

Features.title: Track Your Shelf
Features.text: Easily manage your 'Want to Play' and 'Have Played' lists in one place.

Features.title: Share & Connect
Features.text: Share your favorite games and connect with friends for a social gaming experience.

AboutUs.blurb: Optigame is your personalized board game companion, helping you discover, track, and share your favorite games. Whether you're a casual player or a dedicated enthusiast, Optigame makes finding your next great board game easy and fun.
whyChoose: Personalized recommendations tailored to your tastes
Easy shelf management for games you want to play and have played
